title: USA TODAY Sports' Week 7 NFL picks: Do Cowboys or Eagles claim first place in NFC East?
text:
CLOSE SportsPulse: Lorenzo's Locks are back on track after a winning week. Week 7 offers up juicy matchups and we are here to help you make money off of them. USA TODAY

We should finally learn something about the Cowboys now that Week 7 is here.

Dallas won its first three game playing lightweight opponents but has dropped three since against better competition. Now the arch rival Eagles come to town with first place in the NFC East at stake. Our panel of NFL experts is split on the outcome, but it looks like America's Team has plenty yet to prove in the eyes of our panelists.

And keep an eye on that other team from Texas as Houston visits its personal house of horrors, Indianapolis' Lucas Oil Stadium, as the Texans face the Colts in a battle for supremacy in the AFC South.
description: Currently knotted with 3-3 records, the Eagles visit the Cowboys on Sunday night with sole possession of first place at stake.
